page.title: 09HOMELIFE- CHIPS
page.content: TODAYS TYPICAL DINNERS ARE CHIPS THEY ARE LOVED BY MOST PEOPLE. YOU EAT THEM WITH A KNIFE AND FORK.THERE ARE MANY PLACES TO BUY THEM IN,EXAMPLE HOOLE FISH AND CHIP SHOP.CHIPS ARE MADE FROM POTATOES ,POTATOES ARE BROWN YOU THEN PEEL THE POTATOES AND THEN CUT THEM INTO THIN SLICES. TAKE THIN SLICES AND FRY THEM FOR 15-25 MINUTES TAKE THEM OUT ,AND THEY SHOUD BE GOLDEN BROWN THEY THEN SHOULD BE EATEN THEY CAN BE EATEN WITH ANYTHING SUCH AS SAUCES LIKE TOMATO AND CURRYSAUCE AND OTHER SAUCES LIKE THAT A TRADDITIONAL PUDDING WE EAT IS CHEESE CAKE .IT DOSN'T REALLY TASTE LIKE CHEESE BUT IT IS REALLY NICE . THE THINGS IT IS MADE OF DIGESTIVE BISCUITS AND BUTTER AND CHEESE AND SUGAR AND IT TASTES DELICIOUS SO TASTE IT YOU WILL LIKE IT.
